attributes.action: CANCEL GENUINE TAX CREDIT ERRORS MADE BY APPLICANTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the Tax Credit Office from persecuting people who have made a genuine error on their Tax Credit Claim Form.  Applicants are told to appeal to the Tax Credit office and even go so far as involving the Adjudicators Office which is a very lengthy frustrating process.  This is to no avail and the Tax Credit will not admit to overlooking an error made by an applicant or making the error themselves so honest working famillies are being made to re-pay the errors.  
Please help honest working parents by abolishing the Tax Credit Syestem and cancelling the debt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
